page.title: 10HILL & LOWLAND FARMS, HAILES
page.content:
{Hill farm - Lower Coscomb Grid reference 072 307 Acreage 330 Main crops: none Livestock: sheep (1000 lambs per year raised)
{Lowland farm - Hailes Fruit Farm Grid reference 054 298 Acreage 150 Main crops: Blackcurrants, tayberries, strawberries, raspberries, gooseberries, cob nuts, pears; several varieties of apple: Blenheim, Bramley, Discovery, Laxton, Newton Wonder, Spartan, Sun Tan and Worcester; several varieties of vegetable including rhubarb. The farm also has its own farm shop.
